attributes.action: Sanction Russia with penalties commensurate with devastation caused in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Russia has caused devastation on Ukraine, on civilians, on military bases, on power plants, on airports. They will not stop until they are squeezed so far by international sanctions that they can no longer continue. It is paramount that we step up for Ukraine in the name of international peace, international law and allyship.
attributes.background: Please do all in your power to take Russia off the swift system and impose other of the strictest sanctions possible on Russia, such as sanctioning all 50 of Putin’s richest aides, and cutting gas and oil; also imploring other countries to do the same.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
